thread.title: House razed to ground in Lucena City fire
thread.title_full: House razed to ground in Lucena City fire

title: House razed to ground in Lucena City fire
text:
Inquirer Southern Luzon / 11:13 AM February 22, 2017 Fire (INQUIRER FILE PHOTO/ JOVIC YEE) 
LUCENA CITY â€“ A fire that lasted more than an hour burned down a house here in the city center on Tuesday , police said Wednesday . 
Supt. Arturo Brual Jr., Lucena City police chief, said the fire destroyed the house owned by Manuel Tiu located at the corner of Leon Guinto and Granja streets in Barangay 8. 
Police said no one was hurt during the fire that started around 3:05 p.m. and was put out at 4:15 p.m. ADVERTISEMENT 
Local firemen successfully controlled the blaze from spreading to the nearby newly constructed building and of the adjacent branch of a local fast food chain. 
The cause of fire and amount of destroyed properties are still being determined by the arson investigators from the Lucena fire department, according to the police. SFM
